projects.name: Xrossfit
projects.stack: React.js, Redux, JWT, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose
projects.description: A MERN Stack app for users to keep a log of their daily exercises, buy training equipment and payment with additional functionalities such as user Authentication, payment gateway, admin portal and exercise recommendation.

projects.name: Autonomous Disease Prediction
projects.description: This is a disease prediction app, employing SVM, Naive Bayes, and Random Forest models to analyze 5 user-input symptoms, enhancing early detection for proactive healthcare management.

projects.name: Password Checker
projects.stack: Python3, Have I Been Pwned API, Flask
projects.description: This Flask app lets the user securely check if a password has been pwned or hacked without transmitting the password through theinternet. It uses Troy Hunt’s Have I Been Pwned API to get the passwords that have been leaked in the past using only the first five characters ofthe SHA1‑generated password.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A front-end app that provides real-time weather information for any location.
